title: The SunZeit State 2/24: Ukraine, Russia, Sean Penn, Trump, Michael Flynn, Art Briles
itunes:title: The SunZeit State 2/24: Ukraine, Russia, Sean Penn, Trump, Michael Flynn, Art Briles
description:
In this edition of The SunZeit State, Jack and super producer Becca discuss the Russian invasion of Ukraine, Sean Penn pulling up to Ukraine, Trump and Michael Flynn weighing in on the invasion, and Grambling State hiring disgraced coach Art Briles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
